com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall

Class UninstallScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall.UninstallScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MesosEventClient

    public class UninstallScheduler
extends AbstractScheduler
    This scheduler uninstalls a service and releases all of its resources.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  UninstallScheduler.TimeFetcher
      Time retrieval broken out into a separate object to allow overriding its behavior in tests.

      • UninstallScheduler

        public UninstallScheduler(ServiceSpec serviceSpec,
                          StateStore stateStore,
                          ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore,
                          SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig,
                          java.util.Optional<PlanCustomizer> planCustomizer,
                          java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> namespace,
                          FrameworkStore frameworkStore)
        Creates a new UninstallScheduler using the provided components. The UninstallScheduler builds an uninstall Plan which will clean up the service's reservations, TLS artifacts, zookeeper data, and any other artifacts from running the service.

      • unregistered

        public void unregistered()
        Description copied from interface: MesosEventClient
        Called after the framework has been unregistered from Mesos following a call to MesosEventClient.offers(Collection) which returned OfferResponse#readyToUninstall() as a response. When this is called, the service should advertise the completion of the uninstall operation in its deploy plan.

      • processOffers

        protected MesosEventClient.OfferResponse processOffers(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> offers,
                                                       java.util.Collection<Step> steps)
        Description copied from class: AbstractScheduler
        Invoked when Mesos has provided offers to be evaluated.
        Specified by:
        processOffers in class AbstractScheduler
        Parameters:
        offers - zero or more offers (zero may periodically be passed to 'turn the crank' on other processing)
        steps - candidate steps which had been returned by the PlanCoordinator

      • getUnexpectedResources

        public MesosEventClient.UnexpectedResourcesResponse getUnexpectedResources(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> unusedOffers)
        Returns the resources which are not expected by this service. When uninstalling, all resources are unexpected. The UninstallScheduler just keeps track of them on its 'checklist' as they are removed.
        Parameters:
        unusedOffers - The list of offers which were unclaimed in a prior call to MesosEventClient.offers(Collection)
        Returns:
        A subset of the provided offers paired with their resources to be unreserved/destroyed. May be paired with an error state if remaining unused offers should be declined-short rather than declined-long.

      • processStatusUpdate

        protected void processStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractScheduler
        Invoked when Mesos has provided a task status to be processed.
        Specified by:
        processStatusUpdate in class AbstractScheduler
        Parameters:
        status - the task status, which may be for a task which no longer exists or is otherwise unrelated to the service
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
